name: Static Stretching
description: Holding positions to elongate muscles and improve flexibility.

cards.title: Hamstring Stretch for Posterior Chain Flexibility
cards.description: A deep stretch for the hamstrings and lower back.
bulletpoints: Keep one leg extended and hinge at the hips
Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds without bouncing
Maintain a straight back to prevent injury
cards.summaryText: Settle into a long hamstring hold with hips hinged and spine tall.

cards.title: Chest Opener for Shoulder Flexibility
cards.description: Expanding the chest and opening the shoulders for improved posture.
bulletpoints: Interlace fingers behind the back and lift slightly
Hold the position while keeping shoulders down
cards.summaryText: Open the chest gently, drawing shoulders back while breathing easy.
